title: What is NEET?
text: The National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET) is the central medical entrance exam in India for MBBS, BDS, and AYUSH courses. Physics Wallah offers structured NEET preparation.

title: NEET Syllabus Alignment with NCERT
text: Physics Wallah strictly aligns its NEET course content with the NCERT syllabus, ensuring every topic is covered with depth and accuracy.

title: Chapter-wise NEET PYQs
text: Students get access to chapter-wise Previous Year Questions (PYQs) with detailed explanations to build exam familiarity.

title: Biology DPP for NEET
text: Daily Practice Problems (DPPs) for Biology are designed to strengthen memory-based and concept-based questions.

title: Recorded + Live NEET Lectures
text: PW provides live interactive classes and recorded sessions that students can revisit anytime during NEET prep.

title: NCERT Line-by-Line for NEET
text: Each line of NCERT is explained in class with visual support and examples, especially in Biology and Chemistry.

title: Formula & Concept Sheets for NEET
text: Compact formula sheets for Physics and Chemistry are provided for quick revision and recall before mock tests.

title: NEET Crash Course
text: A fast-track revision program for NEET aspirants with intensive concept classes, practice tests, and booster modules.

title: NEET Mock Test Series
text: Full-syllabus mock tests designed by experts to simulate the NEET exam pattern, including OMR-style digital answer sheets.

title: Organic Chemistry Tricks for NEET
text: Shortcut techniques and mnemonics for learning NEET Organic Chemistry reaction mechanisms and conversions.

title: NEET Cut-Off Trends
text: Physics Wallah provides state-wise and category-wise NEET cutoff analysis from previous years to help set targets.

title: Biological Classification Simplified
text: PW uses flowcharts, mnemonics, and diagrams to explain Biological Classification for NEET Biology in a digestible way.

title: Inorganic Chemistry Memory Boosters
text: Special tricks to remember block elements, periodic properties, and salts for NEET Inorganic Chemistry.

title: Doubt Clearing for NEET
text: PW offers app-based doubt submission, live resolution sessions, and one-on-one expert interaction for NEET queries.

title: Last Minute NEET Preparation Tips
text: Experts share the top 10 do's and don'ts before NEET day including revision priorities, sleep schedule, and stress handling.

title: PW App Features for NEET
text: Students preparing for NEET can track progress, take quizzes, access notes, and watch videos through the PW app.

title: Topic-wise NEET Tests
text: Each subject is divided into units with topic-wise tests, helping students assess and reinforce their understanding.

title: Motivational Support from Mentors
text: NEET students receive mental health guidance and motivation from PW mentors to stay confident during intense prep.

title: NEET and Boards Combined Prep
text: PW’s NEET courses align with board syllabus so students can prepare for both exams simultaneously without overload.

title: NEET Rank Booster Plan
text: A final 30-day plan for NEET aspirants targeting high ranks with daily mock drills, rapid revision, and time-bound testing.

title: Chapter-Wise Physics Tests
text: PW offers chapter-wise Physics tests for NEET that include MCQs with detailed solutions to reinforce understanding.

title: Chapter-Wise Chemistry Tests
text: PW provides chapter-specific Chemistry tests for NEET covering Organic, Inorganic, and Physical chemistry questions.

title: Chapter-Wise Biology Tests
text: Dedicated Biology tests for each chapter help students evaluate knowledge of Botany and Zoology topics for NEET.

title: Full Syllabus Revision Plan
text: PW delivers a structured plan to revise the full NEET syllabus in 60 days with daily targets and test routines.

title: Physics Formula Quiz
text: Quick, timed quiz on essential Physics formulas to improve recall and application for NEET aspirants.

title: Chemistry Formula Quiz
text: Timed quizzes focusing on key Chemistry formulas and reaction equations for rapid reinforcement.

title: Biology Term Quiz
text: Quiz focused on definitions, terminology, and facts in Biology to help students memorize key concepts quickly.

title: Topic-Wise Quick Tests
text: Rapid 10-minute topic tests built for last-minute revision across all three NEET subjects.

title: Custom Test Creator
text: On the app, NEET aspirants can build custom quizzes by selecting topic, difficulty, and number of questions.

title: Study Group Support
text: Students can form NEET-focused peer study groups via app forums to discuss doubts and share resources.

title: Webinars with NEET Mentors
text: Weekly live webinars with NEET experts covering exam trends, solution walkthroughs, and student Q&A.

title: Mental Prep Webinar
text: Experts guide students on managing exam anxiety, dealing with distractions, and maintaining consistency.

title: Previous Year Performance Analytics
text: PW provides analytics on previous year NEET results, highlighting high-scoring states, marks distribution, and trends.

title: Study Tips Infographics
text: Visually engaging infographics covering study tips, exam day routine, and revision strategies for NEET aspirants.

title: Chemistry Themed Assignments
text: PW provides themed assignments like ‘Electrochemistry Week’ or ‘Organic Reactions Day’ to build systematic practice.

title: Biology Practice Assignments
text: Topic-focused Biology assignments help students master areas like Genetics, Ecology, and Physiology with targeted questions.

title: Unit-Wise Physics Assignments
text: PW offers units-based Physics assignments on mechanics, optics, electricity, each with graded difficulty levels.

title: Weekly Challenge Quiz
text: A higher-difficulty weekly quiz helps NEET students sharpen problem-solving skills and compete with peers.

title: Performance Badges & Rewards
text: Students earn badges for achievements like ‘10 tests cleared’, boosting motivation and progress visibility.

title: Offline Revision Workshops
text: On-ground workshops help students solve tough NEET problems and revise concepts under expert guidance.

title: 24/7 Phone Support
text: PW provides a 24/7 helpline where NEET aspirants can call and get solutions to quick doubts and exam queries.

title: AI Time-Management BOT
text: An AI chatbot helps students plan study time dynamically, suggesting focus areas based on test scores and progress.

title: Test Day Alerts & Reminders
text: Students get timely notifications for scheduled tests, sessions, or deadlines in the NEET preparation calendar.

title: Peer Performance Comparison
text: Benchmark your performance against nationwide NEET aspirants to identify strengths and areas for improvement.

title: Career Guidance Session
text: Experts help students plan NEET careers — MBBS, BDS, AYUSH — discussing college selection and application timelines.

title: NEET Exam Day Strategy
text: Tips on time allocation, question-ordering, and staying calm during the NEET exam day for optimal performance.

title: Psychometric Assessment
text: PW offers optional psychometric tests to assess learning styles, stress levels, and recommend personalized prep adjustments.

title: Mock Test – After Action Review
text: Performance reviews include strengths, error trend analysis, and behavioral feedback to improve future mock and actual exam performance.
